content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) 
-  Burner inserter (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) 

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5) and transport belts (positions x=63.5 y=-53.5 and x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities but being out of fuel
 -  Make sure to provide fuel to burner entities before using them
### Errors when using steam engine but not being connected to a power network
 -  Ensure the steam engine is connected to a power network before using it
### Errors when using entities but not having the required ingredients
 -  Ensure the required ingredients are available before using entities
### Errors when using entities but not being plugged into an electric network
 -  Ensure entities are plugged into an electric network before using them

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   No important variables have been assigned.
